storyInfo: The flood is contained, but it has taken its toll on the farms. Construction is halted to free up manpower to save the fields. At this critical juncture, supplies arrive at Dahuang, but even more remarkable is the identity of the one who delivers it.

attributes.text: How many more times must we see this?
Newly-sprouted seedlings, stalks bending from the weight of grain, branches filled with fruit... all gone before Catastrophe.
Frost in early spring almost wiped out the seedlings. It took all our effort to preserve a small portion of them.
What will it take to feed everyone?

attributes.content: A sudden rain has drowned any festive spirit.
The rain begins to subside, but not the water accumulated in the fields, which has reached ankle depth.
How could so much water accumulate so quickly?!
attributes.name: Anxious Nongye Tianshi

attributes.content: It's turbid... did the rain carry dirty mud from upstream? It's going to pollute the fields!
attributes.name: Anxious Nongye Tianshi

attributes.content: Gai si de! What are they doing at the construction site? Drain the damned thing already!
attributes.name: Anxious Nongye Tianshi

attributes.content: This is bad! The dam's burst!
attributes.name: Panicking Nongye Tianshi

attributes.content: Ta ma de! You've gotta be kidding me!
attributes.name: Anxious Nongye Tianshi

attributes.content: What's going on?
attributes.name: Veteran Tumu Tianshi

attributes.content: Apparently, an Originium vein upstream exploded, sending fragments down the river that got caught in the machinery, blowing a hole in the dam.
attributes.name: Young Tumu Tianshi

attributes.content: Why didn't anyone notice?!
attributes.name: Veteran Tumu Tianshi

attributes.content: The water levels were normal. We didn't detect any unusual Originium reactions, or expect the Originium activity to be so irregular...
attributes.name: Young Tumu Tianshi

attributes.content: Jiangui de... during flood season, no less.
attributes.name: Veteran Tumu Tianshi

attributes.content: The water is filled with Originium silt. It's going to wreak havoc on the crops, maybe even cause infection.
attributes.name: Veteran Tumu Tianshi

attributes.content: Everyone be careful! Dam repairs will take time. Get people downstream to block the flow!
attributes.name: Veteran Tumu Tianshi

attributes.content: The current is getting faster. What do we do if the entire dam collapses?
attributes.name: Young Tumu Tianshi

attributes.content: What do you think we can do? Stop it with your Arts, your lives!
attributes.name: Veteran Tumu Tianshi

attributes.content: The polluted water continues to spread. The fields are already filled with mud.
Step on it! More sandbags!
attributes.name: Frantic Nongye Tianshi

attributes.content: We need to protect the experiments in this field! Don't let it get flooded!
attributes.name: Frantic Nongye Tianshi

attributes.content: Aiya! Your specialty is playing with sand, isn't it? Get to it!
attributes.name: Frantic Nongye Tianshi

attributes.content: You're the one who plays with sand! My specialty is soil analysis! Ai, I'll do what I can!
attributes.name: Agitated Nongye Tianshi

attributes.content: Farmers and Tianshis line up to deliver sandbag after sandbag to the banks, scrapping together a makeshift dam with Originium Arts.
There is one last gap in it.
Gah... I can't...
attributes.name: Agitated Nongye Tianshi

attributes.content: The youth leaps up with a bag of sand in his arms and tries to block the gap, but a gust of wind stops him in his tracks.
What are you doing?!
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: That water is mixed with Originium-filled mud! Are you trying to get infected?
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: It's my job to protect the people...
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: You think everyone needs your protection? You're different from the people standing here because why?
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: I—
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: How can I help?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: The flood is caused by a burst dam. It's overwhelmed the field's drainage system.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: We're in flood season, and it'll take time to repair it. The situation will only get worse if we don't do something.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: You're a Messenger, right? Are you fast?
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: I suppose... what do you need me to do?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Someone needs to take charge in this chaos.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Take this map and go to the marked plates. Find the farmer in charge and get the plates ready to move.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: What are you planning?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Dahuang's nomadic city modifications are only partially complete, but some degree of movement is possible.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: While repairs at the dam continue, we will rebuild the drainage system by rearranging the plates and creating elevation...
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Gah—
attributes.name: Veteran Tumu Tianshi

attributes.content: The edges of the metal plate melt as they connect to the gap in the dam.
The flood, seeking the path of least resistance, continues to batter the hasty repair. Water shoots out from the gaps in the metal, cutting open a crack like sharp blades.
That's not how your Arts are supposed to be used, Laoshi! You need to rest. I'll take over for a while.
attributes.name: Young Tumu Tianshi

attributes.content: Back off!
attributes.name: Veteran Tumu Tianshi

attributes.content: Your Arts are no good, child!
attributes.name: Veteran Tumu Tianshi

attributes.content: *cough*... *cough*...
attributes.name: Veteran Tumu Tianshi

attributes.content: Heavenly forge—
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Nian...!
attributes.name: Veteran Tumu Tianshi

attributes.content: What's this mess? We aren't even done at the factory...
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: But looking at this flood... good job holding out this long.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: You should not intervene outside of work in the core city.
attributes.name: Veteran Tumu Tianshi

attributes.content: Call it emergency discretion, alright? Seriously, you engineers are even more uptight than the Sui Regulator.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Go catch your breath. I'll deal with the rest.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: You intend to rearrange the plates?
attributes.name: Tumu Tianshi

attributes.content: No time to explain. I know work on Dahuang's mobile plates is incomplete, but they're capable of basic movement.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Moving a few plates will go a long way towards draining the polluted water in the fields.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: You can't be serious! Only Rong and Tianshi Shu have the authority to move the plates. No one else may—
attributes.name: Tumu Tianshi

attributes.content: Both of them are busy coordinating flood control efforts.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: The flood shows no sign of abating. Fields and crops are being drowned as we speak. What are you going to do, hold a Tianshi Bureau meeting?
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Why you—
attributes.name: Tumu Tianshi

attributes.content: You're Tianshi Shu's apprentice... I've seen you with her.
attributes.name: Tumu Tianshi

attributes.content: Very well... I'll trust you.
attributes.name: Tumu Tianshi

attributes.content: But they are plates of various sizes, and there are dozens. Any movement is a complex job that will take several Tianshis an entire day to calculate.
attributes.name: Tumu Tianshi

attributes.content: No need for that. I have the layout memorized, and a plan.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: This is what we'll do.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Plate A-9, five tiles to the east. Plate B-8, down five levels.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: What are you doing standing there? Get on it!
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Ai! Fine, I don't have any better ideas.
attributes.name: Tumu Tianshi

attributes.content: What's going on? The plate is moving!
attributes.name: Alarmed Farmer

attributes.content: Wait, the flood seems to have gotten weaker...
attributes.name: Alarmed Farmer

attributes.content: The plates are moving! Seek shelter—
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Seek shelter where? The greenhouses?
attributes.name: Alarmed Farmer

attributes.content: Calm down and evacuate through the passage to Plate C-4. It's at a higher elevation now and gives protection from the floods.
attributes.name: Yun Qingping

attributes.content: Qingping! What are you doing here?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: I saw He Sheng and he told me what he's planning.
attributes.name: Yun Qingping

attributes.content: The river is to the north of Dahuang. The plates to the west are the ones that have to be moved in order to drain the water from the northwest side of Dahuang to the valley in the southwest.
attributes.name: Yun Qingping

attributes.content: I didn't think of that at all...
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Mianmian! Stay put!
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Grain Buds?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Candlestick, Inkbrush! What about Big Buffalo? Is he okay?
attributes.name: Grain Buds
Zuo Le
attributes.content: He...

attributes.name: Zuo Le
attributes.content: Don't worry, he's in a safe place.
Oh, I'm so relieved!
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Wait, no, that's not it! The stockbeasts ran away in panic when the plate started moving. Help me catch them!
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: (Terrified cries)
attributes.name: Frightened Stockbeasts

attributes.content: Where did these stockbeasts come from?!
attributes.name: Anxious Farmer

attributes.content: Mianmian! No running!
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Stop! That's the edge of the plate!
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Dusk?!
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Who permitted you to use your powers—
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Slowpokes.
attributes.name: Feminine Voice

attributes.content: Going door to door like this, half the houses will be flooded by the time you reach them.
attributes.name: Feminine Voice

attributes.content: But—
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Never thought I would be helping the Sui Regulator clean up their mess... I'll do it this once. Won't happen again.
attributes.name: Feminine Voice

attributes.content: Wh-Where are we? Tianshi Arts? Who could be so powerful?
attributes.name: Anxious Farmer

attributes.content: Look!
attributes.name: Astonished Farmer

attributes.content: The sky's clearing up...
attributes.name: Astonished Farmer

attributes.content: Sigh...
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: Everyone's exhausted. Dahuang can't afford another disaster.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: I suppose this qualifies as extenuating circumstances.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: Phew...
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: Go away.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: A breeze sweeps across the land.
Vast expanses of farmland undulate like breathing, cutting the surging torrent into smaller streams that flow along planned routes.
Standing on the edge of the plate, the lucky stockbeast watches the flood subside, then digs out a patch of clean grass with its nose and begins to eat.
The sun shines through the clouds, upon a land that has survived disaster—barely.
Plates A-9 through C-3 successfully moved. All accumulated water is now being drained.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: End of report.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: What is the extent of the damage?
attributes.name: Assistant Minister Wan

attributes.content: Varying levels of pollution on Plates A-9 through B-3. Less impact to the other plates, but further inspections are called for.
attributes.name: Old Xiangzhang

attributes.content: Crops from polluted fields must be disposed of. The summer harvest will be significantly impacted, on top of a year that has already seen disappointing results.
attributes.name: Old Xiangzhang

attributes.content: Almost a year of the people's hard work washed away... will there be enough to fill this year's quota?
attributes.name: Assistant Minister Wan

attributes.content: How many will go hungry?
attributes.name: Assistant Minister Wan

attributes.content: There will be enough, thanks to the efforts of countless generations.
attributes.name: Old Xiangzhang

attributes.content: But we can't afford another surprise.
attributes.name: Old Xiangzhang

attributes.content: This is bigger than just Dahuang. We must report to the capital and coordinate food supplies across all of Yan.
attributes.name: Ning Ciqiu

attributes.content: Yumen is closest to Dahuang, but it was also struck by Catastrophe earlier this year. Repairs are still ongoing, and it's unlikely they could spare anyone.
attributes.name: Ning Ciqiu

attributes.content: Indeed. The Ministry of Engineering indicates that Catastrophe frequency has been rising in recent years.
attributes.name: Assistant Minister Wan

attributes.content: This has been a bad year...
attributes.name: Assistant Minister Wan

attributes.content: Dahuang is already the country's biggest food producer. We can't ask for aid from other cities.
attributes.name: Old Xiangzhang

attributes.content: Plate repairs can wait. Dahuang's first priority is food production. There are still many experimental fields close to bearing fruit that have not yet been moved to safer plates...
attributes.name: Old Xiangzhang

attributes.content: We'll need to delay work on the Twelve Pagodas and Five Cities. We need to bring back the Tianshis who were reassigned there to save the remaining farms and grain.
attributes.name: Old Xiangzhang

attributes.content: We can't afford to delay the summer planting.
attributes.name: Old Xiangzhang

attributes.content: I understand your difficulties, but can we not discuss a delay of the Twelve Pagodas and Five Cities?
attributes.name: Assistant Minister Wan

attributes.content: Food is important, of course, but the Twelve Pagodas and Five Cities is also an important national defense project. The imperial court has reason to order it completed by autumn. We must consider the benefits and drawbacks carefully.
attributes.name: Assistant Minister Wan

attributes.content: You want to consider it carefully, you'll write to the capital, have the Council of Ministers meet for ten days, and come back to us with a result.
attributes.name: Old Xiangzhang

attributes.content: A food shortfall doesn't mean people pay a few more coins to buy their grain.
attributes.name: Old Xiangzhang

attributes.content: It means that many thousands will go hungry.
attributes.name: Old Xiangzhang

attributes.content: How many will be driven from their homes if there is a war?
attributes.name: Assistant Minister Wan

attributes.content: Never forget where the Twelve Pagodas and Five Cities project came from.
attributes.name: Assistant Minister Wan

attributes.content: Across the river...
attributes.name: Old Xiangzhang

attributes.content: You know it's more than that.
attributes.name: Assistant Minister Wan

attributes.content: Beyond the issue with demons, there is—
attributes.name: Assistant Minister Wan

attributes.content: Excuse me.
attributes.name: Ning Ciqiu

attributes.content: This is not the right time or place for this topic.
attributes.name: Ning Ciqiu

attributes.content: Watch your words.
attributes.name: Ning Ciqiu

attributes.content: Gai si.
attributes.name: Old Xiangzhang

attributes.content: It's not easy to quantify benefits and drawbacks, but our priority is clear.
attributes.name: Ning Ciqiu

attributes.content: The summer harvest and planting involve years of research and food for millions. There can be no delay.
attributes.name: Ning Ciqiu

attributes.content: We should ask the Tianshis to help inspect and repair affected areas. This is our immediate priority.
attributes.name: Ning Ciqiu

attributes.content: As for the schedule of the Twelve Pagodas and Five Cities, I'll request instructions from the Tianshi Bureaus in the name of the Ministry of Rites. Perhaps something can be done, with the help of the Chamber of Heaven's Designs.
attributes.name: Ning Ciqiu

attributes.content: I'll take responsibility if the imperial court determines that the matter was not properly handled.
attributes.name: Ning Ciqiu

attributes.content: Well, if they want to chop someone's head off, they can make it mine. Just say I put a sword to the Assistant Minister's neck here. You stay out of this.
attributes.name: Old Xiangzhang

attributes.content: How do we get anything done, if we're already talking about responsibility before we've gotten any work done?
attributes.name: Assistant Minister Wan

attributes.content: It's the people of Yan who will pay the price for a mistake. We're merely three insignificant specimens thereof.
attributes.name: Assistant Minister Wan

attributes.content: If both of you insist... I will defer to your decision.
attributes.name: Assistant Minister Wan

attributes.content: I ask that you remember the promises you just made.
attributes.name: Assistant Minister Wan

attributes.content: Hmph.
attributes.name: Old Xiangzhang

attributes.content: No problem. Everything goes well, everyone's happy. Things go wrong, you can pin it all on me.
attributes.name: Ning Ciqiu

attributes.content: Er, that's not what I meant. All I meant to say is that, given the urgency of the situation, it would be prudent to communicate with the Chamber of Heaven's Designs—
attributes.name: Assistant Minister Wan

attributes.content: I most certainly concur. I will draft a detailed report for Assistant Minister Ning to deliver to the Chamber.
attributes.name: Old Xiangzhang

attributes.content: I'll need to prepare for that. I take my leave.
attributes.name: Ning Ciqiu

attributes.content: Excuse me, ladies—eh.
attributes.name: Assistant Minister Wan

attributes.content: Ugh.
attributes.name: Assistant Minister Wan

attributes.content: Well, at least my Ministry of Engineering won't be taking the fall.
attributes.name: Assistant Minister Wan

attributes.content: Let's hope the supplies arrive on time.
attributes.name: Assistant Minister Wan

attributes.content: Kick and roll... kick and roll...
Grain Buds absent-mindedly kicks the dirt in the fields.
The lumps roll haphazardly, while Grain Buds walks with her head bowed, swinging wild grass that she picked from the roadside.
Wonder how long the power outage might last this time. It's so hot, and the stockbeasts are scared. Disease could spread too...
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: They're not eating or sleeping. Are they comfortable in their new home?
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Xiaohe, too. Haven't seen him at dinner for days. Doesn't he know that he needs to rest when tired? He's dumber than a burdenbeast...
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: The weather is getting worse each year, and the crops don't grow well...
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Has Shennong really abandoned this land?
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: She winds the grass around her finger, then rolls it up.
She makes a motion to throw it, then she remembers how Shu weaved the grass into a foal with a few deft movements of her fingers.
Shu could make so many things if I brought this grass back. But she's so busy, and even Candlestick is nowhere to be seen.
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: I guess I should bring some more back and weave it up. Maybe it'll make them happier.
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: And where the heck is Mianmian?
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Grain Buds lifts her feet and kicks a piece of dirt hard.
It hits a rice stalk, spins, and comes to a stop.
Splat.
It leaves no mark on the rice stalk.
A flood.
The crops in the fields bow their heads, just like everyone has.
Only a single rice plant stands tall in the carnage.
It holds its grains high and proud, almost in scorn of everything else that has fallen, as though it has absorbed the lifeforce of everything around it.
When everything else goes dark, it alone blooms bright like life.
Grain Buds could not resist reaching out to touch it.
It is bright red.
A burdenbeast strolls by the edge of the paddies, the sun shining upon it.
It is bright red too.
Here at last.
The tired one closes her reddened eyes.
The river has drowned her mouth, the mud glued her eyes shut. Trees and weeds sway lifelessly in the wind, and she tries her hardest to identify the sound.
Sigh...
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: She brushes her hand against a fallen seedling, and it stands back up in the mud, enervated.
She closes her eyes. The river flows past her hair, and the roots of the trees are like lines on her palm.
There was a time, many years ago, when Catastrophes were frequent as they are now...
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: There was nothing I could do. I watched as rice ready for harvest fell in the fields, leaving nothing but a tiny patch that could barely fill a single bag.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: You said to me, your face full of mud, that there was nothing to worry about. Keep at it, year after year, and it will come.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: There were no wrinkles on your face back then.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: And you weren't Shennong yet.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: So many years have passed. Why is the dream still so distant?
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: The earth beneath her feet undulates like her breathing, as though there is a warm heart deep below that continues to beat, slowly and heavily.
Now its shallow footsteps become recognizable.
The rumble of motor vehicles, only heard once every few months.
Caravans from afar deliver new supplies, new things, and news from other places, bringing some excitement to the life of monotonous labor in Dahuang.
It does not take long for the dust cloud to close the distance, and a figure comes down from the lead vehicle.
He is wearing a light, spotless shirt, and wind and smoke follow him for ten thousand li.
You're back.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: Long time no see.
attributes.name: Elegant Man

attributes.content: My dear sister.
attributes.name: Elegant Man
